title: Will Primož Roglič Race the Vuelta a España? Three-Time Champ Skips Final Tune-up Race after Tour de France Crash
content:
Uncertainty remains over whether Roglič will face off against former teammate Sepp Kuss at La Vuelta after Slovenian star cracked his back at the Tour.

Read the full article at Will Primož Roglič Race the Vuelta a España? Three-Time Champ Skips Final Tune-up Race after Tour de France Crash on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
